author: N5970NZheleng
title: New york
text:
Rooms very small and dark, bathroom again small I am only 5.6 inches tall and I could not sit on the toilet without my knees touching the bathroom wall if you use the shower you could put on a show as there is a pane of glass between the shower and bedroom so do be careful who you share a bedroom with.
Kness
Room Tip: Travel very light as there is not much room for storage and luggage See more room tips
